ยง 3656. Enforcement. 1. A medical equipment services agency may be
subject to fines as provided by this chapter for material violations of
the provisions of this article. A medical equipment services agency may
have its license revoked, suspended, or limited by the commissioner for
repeated violations of the requirements of this article. In such cases,
the commissioner may require the agency to submit a corrective action
plan for approval. The license of an agency may also be revoked,
suspended or limited upon a finding that the actions of such agency have
materially endangered public health and safety.
 2. No permit or certificate shall be revoked, suspended, limited or
annulled without an opportunity afforded the agency an administrative
hearing on the facts at issue.
